text:
ThreatPipes | Belfast, UK | Full Stack Engineer / Dev-ops Engineer | Full Time | ONSITE / REMOTE

ThreatPipes is an early stage cyber security startup based in Belfast, United Kingdom. We're always looking for ambitious and talented people to join us.

Right now we're searching for the first hires to join our engineering team.

To apply or to find out more go to: https://www.threatpipes.com/careers/
